description: Proposed single storey rear extension to existing
decision_conditions: The proposed extension, by reason of its cumulative depth, would be a visually intrusive feature dominating rear views of the dwelling to the detriment of the character and appearance of this modest bungalow and visual amenity of the locality, as well as having an overbearing impact on the amenity of adjacent occupiers at no. 20, contrary to Local Plan Policy 7 and 26 and the Residential Extensions and Alterations Supplementary Planning Document.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: Consideration was given to seeking amendments, but given conflict with adopted planning policy, notification of intended refusal and the reason(s) for it was given to the agent via email on 7th February 2025.
